cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject uses or employs the object as a method, tool, technique, principle, or resource to conduct forensic work or analysis.

qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: to aid in analysis of evidence
qualifiers.CausalHint: to aid in the analysis of evidence

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Forensic scientists use scanning electron microscopes as part of their work.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject uses or employs the object as a method, tool, technique, principle, or resource to conduct forensic work or analysis.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Subject uses or employs the object as a method, tool, technique, principle, or resource to perform tasks or achieve goals.
args.justification: Both relations express the same generic usage predicate; the previous description was narrowly framed around forensic work. Updating the canonical_rel_desc to a domain-agnostic formulation improves schema reusability across the KG while keeping the existing canonical_rel_name, rel_cls, and rel_cls_group consistent.
